name: Deep Sea Diver (bitsnbeats)
description:
Here is the browser version of our first game, Deep Sea Diver. Due to time constraints with Ludum Dare (it was our first game, and the whole publishing process was new to us), we were only originally able to publish the desktop version. This version has some fixed bugs and runs in your browser. 

This game is just a draft, any feedback would be appreciated!

Level Design by Connor Bales

Art by Hunter Bales

Sound Design and Software Engineering by Thomas Bales
